name: buildings
desc: Create 3d buildings interactively or from a file.

properties.name: Switch Property View
properties.desc: Edit the renderable (red) port properties for the module.

properties.name: Import File
properties.desc: Import an existing *.bldg file.

properties.name: Reload Import File
properties.desc: The Reload Import File will force the module to load the the import file and run.

properties.name: Building Height Scale
properties.desc: The Building Height Scale will vertically exaggerate the height of each building.

properties.name: Export File
properties.desc: Export current buildings to a *.bldg file.

properties.name: Default Name
properties.desc: The default name for each new building added.

properties.name: Increment Building Id
properties.desc: New buildings will have an Identifier greater that the value of the last building on the list.

properties.name: Default Offset
properties.desc: The vertical offset for each new building.

properties.name: Default Height
properties.desc: The height to set for each new building.

properties.name: Default Width
properties.desc: The width to set for each new building.

properties.name: Default Length
properties.desc: The length to set for each new building.

properties.name: Default Azimuth
properties.desc: The azimuth to align each new building to.

properties.name: Default Type
properties.desc: The type for each new building.

properties.name: Default Id
properties.desc: The Identifier for each new building.

properties.name: Default Color
properties.desc: The color for new buildings.

properties.name: Probe Action
properties.desc: Allows for the changing of the building center or for adding a new building at the probed location.  Only available when the viewer is connected.

properties.name: Outline Current Building
properties.desc: The Outline Current Building turns on or off a bounding rectangle showing the current building being edited.

properties.name: Delete Current Building
properties.desc: This command will remove the currently selected building from the list of buildings.

properties.name: Current Building
properties.desc: The Current Building allows the user to select a single building to edit.

properties.name: Current Building Values
properties.desc: The Current Building Values.
